description:
■Game Features
Operate the lovely witches and enjoy light-hearted action games!
Avenge your enemies with a variety of attack methods, including knives, swords, and hammers
Explore the vast stages and try to reveal all the maps!
Find all the hidden mushrooms! There are also mushrooms that appear under special conditions!
In front of the house there is a friendly crow who will give you tips, so you can rest assured
Solving the mystery hidden in the menu screen...

■Story
A brother and sister trapped by the Wicked Witch
One rainy night, we worked together to defeat the witch

But the witch's evil spirit remains and takes the body of her brother
The soul of the extruded brother was crushed by the witch and turned into 66 pieces

The girl picked up a witch's hat left on the floor
Determined to save his brother with magical powers

■Game Overview
This is an exploratory 2D action-adventure game in which players explore vast stages while making use of a variety of weapons.
The game was developed using Pixel Game MV, which allows anyone to easily create action games.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series The Witch and The 66 Mushrooms
intro: Adventure through the vast stages and get back your brother's body, which was stolen by a witch!
